headline: A Fresh Look at KKR (KKR) Valuation as New Asia Fund and PayPal Loan Deal Drive Expansion
summary: KKR (NYSE:KKR) is making headlines with two significant moves: a new fundraising push for its fifth Asia-focused private equity fund and a fresh agreement with PayPal to buy up to €65 billion in European buy now, pay later loan receivables. See our latest analysis for KKR. Momentum around KKR has been mixed lately, with shares recently touching $118.67 after a string of notable developments, including a major new Asia fund initiative and a sweeping expansion of its credit footprint in Europe...

headline: Digital Payment Today - Middle East Embedded Finance Boom Drives Financial Inclusion
summary: The embedded finance sector in the Middle East is experiencing significant growth influenced by regulatory support, digital transformation initiatives, and the expansion of e-commerce and gig platforms. This thriving ecosystem is spurred by the integration of Banking-as-a-Service and embedded payment solutions, enhancing financial inclusion across various sectors such as ride-hailing and retail. Prominent regional platforms are incorporating financial tools like credit and digital wallets,...

headline: Swiftly Teams Up with 7-Eleven, Inc. to Lead the Alcohol Cashback Market
summary: SEATTLE, November 24, 2025--Swiftly, a leading retail technology platform, today announced a major new collaboration with 7-Eleven, Inc., marking another milestone in its rapid expansion and cementing its dominance in the alcohol cashback market. The program has officially launched nationwide and is now available across participating 7-Eleven® and Speedway® stores nationwide, bringing Swiftly’s innovative Alcohol Cashback solution to over 10,500+ convenience retail locations and millions of shop

content.title: Swiftly Teams Up with 7-Eleven, Inc. to Lead the Alcohol Cashback Market
content.summary: SEATTLE, November 24, 2025--Swiftly, a leading retail technology platform, today announced a major new collaboration with 7-Eleven, Inc., marking another milestone in its rapid expansion and cementing its dominance in the alcohol cashback market. The program has officially launched nationwide and is now available across participating 7-Eleven® and Speedway® stores nationwide, bringing Swiftly’s innovative Alcohol Cashback solution to over 10,500+ convenience retail locations and millions of shop
